title: Lombardi’s Week 15 Reactions | GM Street (Ep. 368)
description:
Cam Newton’s shoulder injury, the Rams and Jared Goff’s recent struggles, the Cowboys get shut out in Indianapolis, the Bears handle the Packers, and the Patriots wilt against the Steelers. Plus the weekly awards.
Hosts: Michael Lombardi and Tate Frazier
